cui_name: Necrotizing enterocolitis in fetus OR newborn
reasoning: NEC primarily affects premature infants, occurring in 5-10% of very low birth weight infants. Overall incidence is ~0.5-1.0 per 1000 live births. With global birth rate of ~2000 per 100k population per year in 2005, NEC incidence is approximately 1.0 per 100k population per year.
source: Neu J, Walker WA. (2011). Necrotizing enterocolitis. N Engl J Med. 364:255-264
